segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have just got lost with my friends . Would you please help me find them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . We will make a broadcast for you . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shone . And one of my friends ' name is Jessie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , please wait for a moment .
segments.speaker: S1
